education.description: Courses: Computer Architecture, Data Structures, Discrete Mathematics, Linear Algebra
National Merit Scholar, Top Ten in UIL Number Sense, Global Finalist in NASA Space Apps - COVID-19

work.title: Machine Learning Research Fellow
work.description: Developed a deep learning model that detects the bias of individual sentences using Python and machine learning libraries | Increased accuracy from 70 to 85 percent by introducing bidirectional LSTMs to classifier | Assisted over 50 students in CSE 231 (Introduction to Programming) under lecturer John Furcean

work.title: Sustainability Intern
work.description: Designed an Android application that logs user interactions and determines COVID-19 risk | Simulated velocity fields of galaxies using Python and Google Colab | Created a classification program that is able to differentiate between the different types of stars

projects.title: NABU Interface
projects.category: An app that detects risk for COVID-19

projects.category: Detects early dropout drug rehab patients

projects.title: COVID-19 Web Simulator
